values: Today is mother's day.  the most important lesson my mother ever taught me was that marriage is a sacred vow, to be kept and cherished and honored.  i have watched her go through hell with my father, and i have seen him do the same.  yet through it all, they kept their vow, they stayed together, they never cheated.  i would be honored to have that same valid marriage as my mother.  i can only hope, work, and pray that i live up to her example of what a wife and mother are.  she's an angel, and i love her so much.
some people's doctors are so STUPID. i wish everyone had a great doctor for their BPD like I do.

is it possible that you don't feel this anguish in your soul? is it possible that your body does not cry out for me as mine does for you? how can you be silent, when i am falling at your feet, begging to hear your voice? 
if i had anything to give you, i would give you the world. yet i am empty. what can i give you, that you will take and be satisfied with?
of my journal. brand new page by sierra !!

he says to forget trying to figure everything out. he says as long as i'm sober today, i AM figuring it out. i'm doing it right as long as i'm not using. he says a lot of things that make sense.

and then he says i love you... and i forget all those things he just told me. 
i'm a fool for you.

someone greatly impacted me today. they said they hated to write love on her arms, and stated their various reasons. i agreed on the good majority of it. but what most impacted me was that they said people join organizations like twloha and ignore the depression and suffering of the people around them. i pray that i will never again be guilty of this. 

and F the organizations!!!!

it's about time to break out those pilates videos. i will not leave this winter looking like a cow. new year's resolution: fit into the skinny jeans i bought this fall. 

i miss my bby. i wish he would come back.

and i might go to liberty university and STILL be able to go wherever i want, whenever i want. that is... if i can find 40 grand. mammaw and pappaw get here this week!!!!! 

can't wait to go homeeee
and get my sewing machine please?

it's been a looong time since i've read the little prince.  it feels good to read a children's book.
hurray for neighbors who watch your back. and sweet tea. and apple and berry crisp.
~come home~
     xoxo

one day soon i will have a tattoo on the palm of my hand. 

i'm so in love with Him.

FUCKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK i hate when my posts get deleted.  



FUCK FUCK FUCK FUCK FUCK FUCK FUCK.
\



the point of the post was.... i can't expect michael to believe that this is a true and permanent change in my life.  i can't expect him to have faith in me when i have lost faith in myself over the past few years.  i can't expect him to encourage me in my recovery, i have to encourage MYSELF and allow people who understand me to encourage me and lift me up.  i have to lean on god to give me the hope and encouragement i need.  and maybe one day mikey will look at what i've done, and be proud of me, and see the new life i'm living and want the same life for himself.



please, dear god, help me.  help me to be patient with myself and others, and help me not to be discouraged.  help me to put all my trust in YOU and you alone, and allow you to lead me down this path without veering off.  help me to forgive and to love and to stay on the right road.

"the goal of tattooing was never beauty. the goal was change. from the scarified Nubian priests of 2000 BC, to the tattooed acolytes of the Cybele cult of ancient Rome, to the moko scars of the modern Maori, humans have tattooed themselves as a way of offering up their bodies in partial sacrifice, enduring the physical pain of embellishment and emerging changed beings...
...the act of tattooing one's skin was a transformative declaration of power, an announcement to the world...

I AM IN CONTROL OF MY OWN FLESH."



the human spirit craves mastery over its carnal shell.

i want you.
i want your attention.
i want your sex.
i want your body.
i want your words to be only for me.
i want to belong to you.
i want you to belong to me.
i want your heart.
i want your soul.
i want everything you have to give me.
i want your love.
i want your hate.
i want your dreams.
i want you.

sometimes when i listen to eisley it makes me sick in my stomach. i don't know why. that's a lie. 

i went surfing today for the first time since my sophomore year of college. i can't explain it. but it blessed me. 

i also made a pig eatin good cake. i got grumpy when it wasn't as fluffy as i wanted, but its all good, i covered any mistakes with extra icing. 
i watched mike and meredith eat their romantic dinner and looked at pictures of them together on the beach and listened to their corny bullshit.  now THAT makes me sick in my stomach. but i do love them. 

i can't wait to scan and upload all my journal pages this year. it'll be good to get them out. i can't wait for school to start so i have something to do every day, some kind of responsibility that will make me proud.  going to school always helps me realize how very very blessed my life is.  there is always something fun to look at at school. i love studying something that i'm so passionate about. i love learning about people and essentially about myself as well. 

i've been reading a borderline personality blog.  it's the first time being a part of anything like it, and i believe i have found a godsend, a safe haven, a place where people can finally just listen to me and then tell me they know exactly how i feel, even though what i feel is so fucked up.  i love that there are people in this world, ALL OVER the world, that can understand what it's like to have something like this, that controls you, but no one sees it or believes it or acknowledges it. they only blame you for being the way you are.  i have to keep remembering they don't understand.  it's not because they're bad people, it's just because they don't know what to do or think.  i have to have a lot more grace for a lot more people.  i told my mom today what i think is the way people get to heaven. it was so simple when i explained it to her, but in my own head i complicate it.  it really is that simple.  i should take my own advice.

oh lord thank you for your grace
fit to wipe clean my mistakes
but all these people here, they hate
spittin rumors, theyre all fake
and i wonder, can i make it?
can i take it?
will i break it?
and you say, i'll fight your battles,
theyll walk behind you, theyre just cattle
it doesn't matter
they will fall by the wayside
they can't hurt you
you're on the safe side

oh lord thank you for your grace. 
forgive me for my mistakes.
with love you replace my hate
and your child, of me  you make

i fucking hate it here. i hate all of you people who claim you're my friend but you're not. i hate all of you motherfuckers who think you can do whatever the fuck you want with me, and then smile in my fucking face and ask me to hang out.  i hate all you people who fucking CLAIM. but you have nothing.
you have nothing i would ever want.

 


grow the fuck up.
stop talking shit.
and stay the FUCK away from my house.

i have been holed up for days in my apartment, hoping for adventures but having to create my own. i've started a paper mache tree. with a house. i've filled pages of my five current journals. finallly. i want things to come to a close. i'm anxious for some things in my life to come to a complete close. 

i have realized that i am finally happy with myself. my body. i'm still not so sure about my mind, but i have come to a point in my life where i am happy just the way i am. 

maybe i have someone to thank for that. maybe a few people.
but i have one person in particular. there are no words to really describe him.

last but not least, i made a delicious cobbler today with blackberries and raspberries and i am extremely proud to say my grandmother has taught me well.

i always return to my trusted livejournal. it hasn't failed me yet lol. 
what an odd set of days it has been in my life. i have yet to observe someone who seems truly happy... where are they? don't they know the joy and mercy and grace that comes with Life? Thank God for the mouths to eat and the eyes to see and the ears to hear the beauty that still remains in the world in some small way. After all, He gives and He takes away, and it's always for the best, for a perfect plan that exists outside of us and outside of the things we hear and see and feel and taste.  There is a much bigger picture that we are not yet prepared to envision, but we must trust in this bigger plan nevertheless.  Bless those who believe even though they do not see. 
as for now, alfred hitchcock is playing in the background and i am eating eating eating! i have yet to find a scanner to post my journals to see if someone can help me out a bit.... but i am also finding ways to work with others on projects, share inspiration, you know, all that stuff.  one day i'm going to write a book about all of this.
 
that'll do, pig. that'll do.

girl talk was the SHIIiiiitttttt

i love all my boys. 
and my girls, for that matter. 
i'm glad my brother found someone to take care of him. 
and.
i'm going to pick up my bby in naples. 
toodloo tampa.

"it wasn't so much neglect...i had the inconsistency of a mother who i believe has the same personality disorder as i do. and i am at a complete loss for what to do about it. i feel hopeless. where will i find a companion who can deal with my insanity? my father is to be commended for his commitment to her. i believe he understood she was sick. i have no one who will even believe me if i claim this as an illness. it seems to everyone that i do not suffer from a lack of control, but that i attempt to manipulate my emotions, and the causes behind them. as if they are a tool i use instead of a curse i suffer. they believe my claims of uncontrol are my excuse for my actions, however incomprehensible my actions may seem. they believe that my entrapment is of my own doing, that i hold the keys to my own freedom. but tell me...WHO HOLDS THE KEYS TO THEIR OWN FREEDOM? no one. no one is free from themselves. ever. they attempt, and occasionally succeed, at overcoming their natures. nevertheless, their natures persist and rule them. healthy people are ones who overcome their natures, those natures that so often seek to destroy them. they overcome their natures in adopting rationality and truth, i suppose.
my nature is composed of fear. fear of my own capabilities of destruction, especially of myself. fear that people see the things i see, and that they will hate me for it. my weakness. my foolishness. fear of the unknown, of what can happen to me at any moment.
perhaps it is a fear of myself. of the thoughts that can invade my mind and slowly kill me. of the thoughts i can't control. the fear and depression and reactions that i cannot control.
is it because i don't know how? or is it because things are truly out of my grasp?
yet i hold on to these things i hate. as if my very existence, my very self, depends on them. they are all i know of myself, they are the only constants. i have learned my helplessness and i have grown to embrace it, not because it feels good, but because it is the only thing i am sure of. any type of happiness or contentment is a risk to me. it can leave. at any moment.
i used to tell myself, over and over again, that the bad shit will always come back. to stay in the hiding place of my own heart so they couldn't hurt me the next time. yet each time i was hurt just as badly. i wasn't even enough protection for myself. i tried so hard to keep myself safe, and each time, i failed.
eventually i learned to hurt myself, so the pain they inflicted would be meaningless. i learned that my self-inflicted pain felt good compared to the pain that life itself was so determined to deliver. for once, i had control.
now, even that safe place is gone. i choose not to run to my kind of pain, and instead endure the pain of living. i search for people to run to, but they cannot relieve my suffering. i have learned to endure and to live. but sometimes the pain seems unbearable. and i long to run to what i know to be safe. my control of my own pain.
i hate myself because i cannot control the pain i feel.
i am dissatisfied with the world.
there is no one who is truly safe... is there? i dare not hope.
the theme of my life.
i dare not hope.
i know that these cognitions are damaging to myself. i have seen bad things come of it. yet i am deathly afraid of the bad things that can come along with not being protective of myself, however futile my attempts are.
no matter what i seem to do, i am in the open, unsheltered from the battering storms that come my way. who will be my shelter? God himself does not shelter me from pain. God himself has forsaken me to the powers of my own mind.
Dear God! remove me from the grasp of my own hands!
i am a slave to my own powers of darkness, and i desire to be free. i desire to be free of myself.
who can deliver me, but you?
who can save me from the destruction of myself? you are the only one. no one has the knowledge or pwer to control me, your creation. no one has the power to redeem me. ironic, that it is the shedding of blood, your blood, that has redeemed me. ironic that your wounds were self-inflicted, in order to save me from being eternally wounded. ironic that you hurt, in order to save me from hurt.
let me not forget the sacrifice you have made in order for me to avoid the sacrific of myself. i am no longer at the mercy of my vices, or anyone else's; i am no longer at the mercy of the infliction of pain. i am sheltered by you, by the shedding of your blood that has forever covered me. and i may walk in the peace and joy of the new life you have given me, so opposing to the life i have experienced before. my rests in you, and this hope has never been dashed. you have never failed me, My God. even in my own despair, you keep me.
you keep me."

c.
goodnight. i love you. and i'm happy now that you're happy.
j.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY PETER

and i miss you james k




i heard a child yell in church that he didn't want to go to heaven because it's boring and there's nothing to do. and when the pastor asked everyone to stand, he proceeded to tell the pastor that he wasn't going to stand for HIM. 
it was lovely.

gillian, hopefully those tattoos are goin down this weekend, if i'm lucky. i luff you.

i've been journaling a lot and it makes me feel clean. like all of it is emptied out of me. 
the haze going through this town is tasteful.
and someone said yesterday that he doesn't listen to himself, he talks to himself.
he was talking about truth versus lies. there is most certainly a difference between the two. and there is most certainly a truth, or many truths that lead to one truth, kind of like how a story has one unifying theme. 
and this world is most certainly full of lies and liars. but finding the truth isn't really as difficult as it seems... it can be rather simple. in some cases. if you look at things through the eyes of reality instead of the eyes of the people around you, and especially your own. 
i find myself lying to myself constantly, when i try to listen to myself. telling me i'll never be better, telling me i've fucked up too badly, i'll never be smart enough, i'll never be consistent enough, i'll never break all the bad habits i know i have  but don't want to let go of. 
but when i'm talking to myself... when i'm telling myself something... i can learn to tell myself the truth. not the truth about how i FEEL, but the truth about what i know. 
that i'm good enough. that nothing is fucked up so badly that it can't be repaired, that no one is truly wise and i can't trust in my own wisdom, that inconsistency is part of growth, and that i am strong enough to do anything i want. 

that's what i'm telling myself these days. starting to tell the truth to yourself is a nice feeling. 

and for cory... thanks for being the one to start telling the truth to yourself. i respect that more than you know. you helped show me the way.

i'm not gonna lie. i've been eating bars for three days now. 
it makes me a nicer person to the people i hate.
does that make me crazy?

i've decided that even the people i have considered my friends... are not my friends. unfortunately.
and for once, this isn't some bitchy impulse of mine, wanting to be alone and not giving a fuck about anyone.
it's nothing like that.
i'm perfectly peaceful and yes, perhaps even content, with the fact that the all the people i thought i could trust... are really just assholes. not a single one of them cares about someone else more than themselves. all they care about is what they want and how they can get it, and if it involves stepping on other people, then so be it.
i've never realized before how selfish some people are. sometimes their friends need them and theyre too concerned about their own problems to reach out and help. sometimes they try to fix others' problems when their problems are the ones causing so much damage. sometimes they lie to you about who they are because they want you to think they're a good person, when really they're not. you find out afterwards.

and these people... i let them hurt me and walk over me allllll the fucking time. 
and i am fking done.
i'm gonna trust who i want to trust, i'm going to do what i want to do, and i WILL NOT be a selfish person. i think about others before myself, i sacrifice what i want to do all the time if it's good for someone i care about, i never let rumors and faults change how much i love them or care about them. i don't hold grudges and i don't act snobby and i don't compare and contrast mistakes. and you know what? that makes ME a good person. 


so... i don't give a fuck lol.


cory comes home soon and i'm ecstatic. 
i've stopped caring what sandy thinks about me and i'm relieved.
i've spent tons of time with my family and i'm fulfilled.
and i'm meeting all the kinds of people i want to surround myself with. 
and i am happy. 

it's nice to realize your own naivety, lose it, and then see everyone else's.




THE BOYS ARE BAILING ON THE BEACH TODAY. LAAAAAME.

today i learned that 
1. the constant changes in life
2. the way my body handles it physically
3. the combination of the stress and how i handle it personally
all contribute to my overall health physically.
my physical health then in turn will attack my mental health.
and recovery will be lost, and illness will take over, be it mental or otherwise. 

which leads me to believe that the only way to avoid this, and to avoid illness in general (mental, medical, etc.), is to learn how to deal with the changes. 
so i am going to remember the changes are exciting. this IS life, after all, it's supposed to be good.
i have to see the good and perfect plan that he's got for me, whatever it is, and see the stressors as just things to make me better. and keep life interesting. 
i learned that today in my psychology book... and yet i've been going over this in my head for days now.
life is like one big acid trip, and i don't have to pay for it. 
lol.

i love my family and i want to move to 772 and be with them always. 
i love psychology and i want to talk to people and help people see what they need to see. 
i love god and the way he shows me something new every day and takes the bad things and turns them into good things. 
i love coffee mugs with stenciled flowers. 
i love mason jars when they're empty. 
i love stacks of text books and ripped paper. 
i love ink and the little lines that pens make. 
i love the feeling in the morning when the sun isn't all the way up. and i love the evening when the sun isn't all the way down.
i love things that are sewn so the stitching shows. 
i love my grandmother's handwriting on her recipe cards.
i love when my dad smiles. 


and you. i love you, too.






i'm sorry. 
i just couldn't do it anymore. 
i was waiting for you to call me and say you've been wrong and you need me and you can't breathe without me and you'll do anything and fight everything to be with me. 
i didn't get that call. 
and i can't wait anymore.

how can i keep my soul in me, so that it doesn't touch your soul?
how can i raise it high enough, past you, to other things?
i would like to shelter it, among remote, lost objects, in some dark and silent place that doesn't resonate when your depths resound.
yet everything that touches us, me and you, takes us together like a violin's bow, which draws one voice out of two separate strings.
upon what instrument are we two spanned?
and what musician holds us in his hand?
oh sweetest song.

i have so many mean things to say. because i'm angry. and maybe they deserve to hear it. 
but what will it do for me? nothing... making them feel shitty won't change who they are. and saying what i need to say will only make me feel like a bitch. 
but i fucking hate keeping my mouth shut. that's how i always get into trouble. i tell people what i think about them and the things that they do. and who wants a friend who shows you your true colors?
no one, apparently.
so i'll keep it quiet. 
but don't worry... i'm fully aware of the kind of person you are. 
and one day... everyone else will too. 



as for me.... jim beam is my bff and i get to sing with my favorite boys tonight. 
so fuck yall.

i ran home to 772, just to lay on my couch and be sick. 
but i'd much rather be sick here than tampa.


dear will mccarty,

i have so many things to say to you. i don't know where to begin. there are pictures of you all over my house. a bulletin board with your smiling face, among all the pictures of my family and the people we love. you're among them. 
and so today i was staring at those pictures... wondering when i had last seen you smile like that. i can't remember. 
i can't even remember the last time you spoke a full sentence to me. 

this breaks me. i want to scream at you. i want to yell and hit you and scream.... why did you do this? how could you leave your best friend like that? how can you leave your FAMILY like that?? 
last night i went through all my shit from high school... powderpuff clothes and prom gifts and notebooks. i was flipping through the notebooks, looking through old journals. there are so many pages with your drawings on them... just stupid inside jokes. you had written yourself all over my life. 

and now you're gone? you just disappeared. you don't like me, you can't even stand to be around me. why? what did i do? what terrible thing must i have done to get you to hate me the way you do. 

all i can think about is how we used to be best friends. you used to be happy.
now all you do is drink and smoke. you do it every day. and no one has the balls to talk to you or try to get you to stop. i wish you knew how sad you looked. i wish you knew how different you are now from the happy guy i used to spend every day with. you used to brighten my day with your smile. 

now my days are filled with worry about you. worrying over someone who doesn't give two shits about me. 
nevertheless... i love you with all my heart. i pray one day you can stop drinking enough to lift the cover from your eyes so you can laugh again like you used to. i pray one day you realize who you are... and you return to that person. i pray that one day you will be truly happy. and yes... i even pray that one day you can be my friend. 

i know you will never read this. but if you do....

remember how it used to be. remember who you used to be. 

i love you.
Jade.

i'm going to be a doctor one day. 
and i'm going to change the world with what i write. 
and i'm going to change the lives of the people i meet. 








i wish i had the words for what my heart feels. 
as if you were around to listen.

hey sean?
it's really fucked up what you did to me. it's really fucked up that after everything, you can't even call me to say hi, happy birthday, happy new year, what the fuck ever. when you were supposed to be my best friend. 
YOU are the one that fucked up this time, and badly. you destroyed any chance for us to be cool with each other. 
and on top of it all, you broke my heart. 
so... i don't know why i'm even typing this. 
i guess because i would say it to your face but you're avoiding me like the plague. 
i'm assuming because you're fully aware of how badly you fucked with me. 

the thing is... you didn't even fuck with me that badly. it's no earth-shattering news for me to hear that you don't want to be with me. i got over that a long time ago. and frankly, i don't really want to be with you either. 
but it would have been nice to hear some kind of explanation from you. it would have been nice to hear the truth instead of a ton of bullshit. 

ugh. i don't know why i bother. 
i need closure. and this is it. 
unfortunately, i think i'm always going to be waiting around for the phone call from you, saying we'll be okay. it's a phone call i doubt you'll ever give me, and i should just get the fuck over it.

He loved her and she loved him.
His kisses sucked out her whole past and future or tried to
He had no other appetite
She bit him she gnawed him she sucked
She wanted him complete inside her
Safe and sure forever and ever
Their little cries fluttered into the curtains

Her eyes wanted nothing to get away
Her looks nailed down his hands his wrists his elbows
He gripped her hard so that life
Should not drag her from that moment
He wanted all future to cease
He wanted to topple with his arms round her
Off that moment's brink and into nothing
Or everlasting or whatever there was

Her embrace was an immense press
To print him into her bones
His smiles were the garrets of a fairy palace
Where the real world would never come
Her smiles were spider bites
So he would lie still till she felt hungry
His words were occupying armies
Her laughs were an assassin's attempts
His looks were bullets daggers of revenge
His glances were ghosts in the corner with horrible secrets
His whispers were whips and jackboots
Her kisses were lawyers steadily writing
His caresses were the last hooks of a castaway
Her love-tricks were the grinding of locks
And their deep cries crawled over the floors
Like an animal dragging a great trap
His promises were the surgeon's gag
Her promises took the top off his skull
She would get a brooch made of it
His vows pulled out all her sinews
He showed her how to make a love-knot
Her vows put his eyes in formalin
At the back of her secret drawer
Their screams stuck in the wall

Their heads fell apart into sleep like the two halves
Of a lopped melon, but love is hard to stop

In their entwined sleep they exchanged arms and legs
In their dreams their brains took each other hostage

In the morning they wore each other's face

i'm sorry, everyone, for not hanging out with you while i'm in town. there's family shit. and stuff.

but i'll call you soon, i promise.

as for everything else... i bought the communist manifesto today, in an attempt to be able to back up my stance on communism to the family members over the holidays. my uncle, in particular. not necessarily because i believe in communism, although it has some appealing aspects to it, but because i like to make my close-minded family think about the bigger picture. they disagree with so many things and fail to see all the similarities. i think that is a weakness in people. a terrible weakness.
i see so many differences in people and they anger me because they're different than me. but they shouldn't. instead, i should appreciate them, i suppose. not to say there aren't things that are bad, that shouldn't be appreciated, but the actual person should always have an inherent value.
then i think about the similarities between people. i'm glad i have things in me that make me different but it's much more comforting in my heart to know that i have even more things that make me similar to humanity in general. i eat, i sleep, and for the most part, i think in the same ways as most people. as everyone, essentially. i may do these things differently in slight variations, but i do them the same as everyone else. it makes me feel not so alone.  and it makes me feel like somehow i will be able to find the one thing that will connect me to someone. somehow. i need some way to connect myself with the people i love. so they know that i love them.

does that make sense?

my first day in martin county had its ups and downs.
it sometimes feels like nothing has changed. they still fight. they still throw my world into a panic. i still had to run away today.
i hate feeling like the parent. i hate having to tell her things that i know she must already know. i hate feling stronger than her. i hate it. 
but i love seeing mikey. i love seeing all of them. i do. i just can't understand why things cant be okay. 
i feel like screaming but there's nowhere to go.

i don't know why i bother. everyone leaves in the end anyways. nobody matches up to what they say. nobody keeps their promises and nobody is worth trusting. 
i don't know why i do.
i trust everyone. with everything in me, with my whole heart, i trust what they say when they talk to me and look me in the eyes. 
and then they bail. everyone bails. 
it makes me want to drop everyone. stay away from everyone. lock my door and close the blinds and never deal with any of you again.



if you wanted to be part of my life,
if you wanted ME to be part of YOURS,
then show me. prove it. 



from now on...
you're guilty until proven innocent.
i'd like someone, anyone, who can get to samantha schwartz to tell her thank you for introducing me to brand new.

i have an awesome mom and dad. 
and some other people i consider family that are awesome too.
and i have a lot of things that i could write down.
i just don't really know how.

i hope i don't have to go to work today. 

what do you do when you don't have any money?

i would just like everyone to know that if i haven't responded to you in a while... it's not because i don't love you. it's just because i'm too lazy and busy to type things out to people or even call them. and i'm sorry for that, it's shitty of me. 

second of all, i'd like everyone to know i lost my phone and who knows when i'll have it back. so i'm out of touch, if you want to reach me... well, shit, i dunno. show up at my house i guess. i don't really care. 

and now... i get to rant and rave. 
i have hardly slept for days, and tonight is another night with mayyyyybe 5 and a half hours, if i'm lucky. it's not because i'm doing shit i'm necessarily supposed to be doing. i don't know WHAT i do, really. 
i have no fucking clue what i'm doing with myself these days. 
just going through the motions, which is boring. and it looks successful and on-track to everyone else, but to me it's just... boring.

and sean rozycki, considering you're my best friend, i think it's fucking shitty that we only talk a little bit, because every day i find a million things i want to tell you but i never get the chance to. just little things i find funny or gossip i want to whisper to you cause i know you'll never ever tell anyone. and you don't give a shit. which is awesome. 
i absolutely l.o.v.e. everything about you, and i always will, i know that. i also know we can't be together right now, i know you can't be with me... and i understand it and i'm accepting it... but... is it bad that i still have 100% faith that we'll be okay one day? you're the only person i could ever see spending the rest of my life with. you're the only person i could spend every day with, even if it's an awful day, and still be happy. you're everything that balances me out. and i want you back one day. oookay?

okay. 
that's enough out of me. 
pray that my alarm clock works tomorrow. or i'm in big trouble lol. 





OH and p.s. sometimes i fking hate the people i work with. some of them. all of them. except two.

things change so quickly and so unexpectedly.
it's funny how people literally show up on your doorstep.

things are starting to clear up. 
my head is starting to clear. 
i'm starting to not be so scared... not be so sick. 

and with this new clearing, the past few months have been running through my mind and i'm seeing everything differently.
i've been foolish, in so many ways. 




but i'm okay now. everything's okay. and i'm okay. 
and winter is coming...

i can't explain what i feel in my heart and my stomach.

sean... i feel like i'm dying without you. i feel like my whole future is shot. you were my world; and i know this is much easier for you but.... don't you feel this? aren't you lost like me?






i wish you would tell me it's going to be okay.
i wish you would call me and tell me this is all over. tell me you're back and you're not going anywhere. 


because seriously i'm fucking desperate for you. still.

i'm so sick. 
i can't explain it....
but it feels awful.

dear world,

i could write down all the things i hate.
i could tell you all the things i feel. 
i could write down everything i see, how i see it. 


but there would be no point.
you can't understand me. you can't hear me.
you can't know. 





is this how it's supposed to be?
is this how things really are?

tell me why things aren't right. tell me why no one has answers for me. 
tell me why i can see and hear and feel all the things that it's impossible to say?
tell me why i can't get you to hear me. 


yours. truly. 
jade.
